name: Grand Inquisitor
subtitle: Embracing the Darkside
text:
After you activate this character, if an opponent has one or more dice showing a blank, you may turn one of this character's character dice to any side.
[special] - Turn 2 other dice to a side showing a blank. Then deal damage to a character equal to the number of dice showing a blank.

name: Palpatine
subtitle: Sith Eternal Emperor
text:
After you remove an opponent's character die, heal 1 damage from this character.
After this die is removed, deal 1 damage to this character.

name: Sith Cultist
subtitle: Emperor's Minion
text: Include only if you have a unique Blue character on your team. After setup, add a set-aside Sith Cultist (p3) to your team. Before one of your characters would be defeated, you may defeat this character instead. Then heal 2 damage from that character, or 3 damage instead if you spot a Sith.

name: Absorbing the Essence
text:
Play only if an opponent removed one of your dice during their last turn this round.
Spot a Blue character that is 20 or more points to remove a die showing a value of 2 or less and deal 1 damage to up to two different characters.

name: Anger Leads To Hate
text: Deal 1 unblockable damage to one of your Blue characters. Then, for each die showing a blank ([blank]), you may turn a die to a side showing a blank ([blank]).

name: Overwhelm
text:
Play only if you have 4 or more dice in your pool and no dice showing a blank ([blank]).
Resolve 2 of your dice, increasing each of their values by 1.

name: I Am All The Sith
text: Roll all character dice on one of your Blue characters into your pool.

name: Emperor Voices
text: Power Action - Roll 1 set-aside Snoke ([WotF]4) die into your pool. You may spot Palpatine to roll 1 more set-aside Snoke ([WotF]4) die into your pool.

name: Sith Throne
text: After one of your Blue dice is removed, you may exhaust this support to place 1 resource on it. Action - Remove all resources from this support to resolve one of your dice showing damage, increasing its value by that amount.

name: Force Cataclysm
text: Blue character only. After you play this upgrade, you may roll this die into your pool. [special] - Reroll this die instead of removing it. You may spot a Sith and exhaust this upgrade to roll a character die on that character into your pool.

name: Inquisitor Lightsaber
text:
While an opponent has a die showing a blank, you can resolve this die showing a modifier as if it were not a modifier.
[special] - Deal 1 damage to a character. Turn an opponent's die to a side showing a blank. Turn one of your dice to any side.

name: Droideka
text: You can only play mod upgrades on this character. Your opponents cannot resolve dice showing damage with a value of 1 against this character.

name: Tarkin
subtitle: Merciless Leader
text:
After you draw one or more cards except during setup, you may deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent.
[special] - Draw a card. You may reveal that card to deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to half its cost rounded up.

name: Aggressive Intel
text: Play only if you control the battlefield. Spot a leader to choose a color. Then reveal an opponent's hand and deal indirect damage to them equal to the number of cards in their hand that match the chosen color.

name: Fear of this Station
text: Spot a support to draw 3 cards.

name: Far Too Trusting
text: Force your opponent to choose one of their characters. You may resolve one of your dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]) increasing its value by 2, or by 1 instead if you resolve it against the chosen character.

name: Imperial March
text: After you resolve a die showing a resource ([resource]), you may exhaust this plot and spend any number of resources to place that many resources on this plot. Power Action - Remove up to 5 resources from this plot to roll that many set-aside Veteran Stormtrooper ([LEG]13) dice into your pool. If you spot 2 leaders, you may reroll any of those dice. Resolve those dice in any order or remove them.

name: Executrix
text: Decrease the cost of this support by 1 if you drew one or more cards during the action phase this round. Power Action - If this die was removed during an opponent's last turn this round, you may spot a leader and discard a card from your hand to roll this die into your pool.

name: TIE Fighter Squadron
text: After you activate this support, if it is piloted, you may roll 1 set-aside copy of this die ([EC]19) into your pool. Spot Darth Vader to turn a TIE Fighter Squadron die to any side.

illustrator: Jason Juta © Wizards of the Coast
name: Aggressive Stance
text: Modify droid character or support. After you resolve one of attached support or character's character dice, exhaust this upgrade to deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent. You may discard this upgrade to play a mod from your hand or discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1.

name: Empire's Visionaries
text: Red leader character only. After an opponent resolves a die showing a resource ([resource]), you may exhaust this upgrade and spend 1 resource to place 1 resource on a non-character card.

name: Imperial Rank
text:
Red character only.
After you play this upgrade, you may draw a card.

name: Rolling Stance
text: Modify droid character or support. After you activate attached character or support, give 1 shield to one of your characters. You may discard this upgrade to play a mod from your hand or discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1.

name: Greedo
subtitle: Off-tempo Mercenary
text: Before you take an action, if it is the same action as an opponent's action last turn this round, you may discard an event from your hand to gain 1 action.

name: Qi'ra
subtitle: The New Crimson Dawn
text:
After you activate this character, reroll a character die or turn a hero die to any side.
[special] - Roll a set-aside Maul ([SoH]3) die into your pool. You may spend 1 resource to reroll this die instead of removing it.

name: Fooling the Fool
text: Spot a scoundrel to force an opponent to discard a card from their hand. Then, if that card's cost is not equal to 0, draw a card.

name: Hidden in the Shadow
text: Remove a die not showing a value of 2. You must pass your next turn this round.

flavor: “They fly now?! They fly now.”                                                                  – Finn and Poe Dameron
name: Rush
text: Discard an event from your hand to gain 2 actions.

name: Vicious Move
text: After you reroll one of your Yellow dice, you may discard this support and spend 1 resource to roll a set-aside copy of that die into your pool.

name: Dryden Vos' Blades
text:
Before you draw one or more cards, look at the top card of your deck. You may discard that card.
[special] - You may exhaust this upgrade to roll a set-aside copy of this die ([EC]30) into your pool. Then reroll this die instead of removing it.

name: Greedo's Blaster
text: After you discard a card from your hand, if this upgrade is on Greedo, you may exhaust this upgrade to draw a card.

name: Ki-Adi-Mundi
subtitle: Force Wisdom
text:
After you activate this character, you may draw a card. Then you may discard that card to give 1 shield to this character.
After you resolve this die showing a value of 1, you may deal 1 damage to a character or give 1 shield to a character.

name: Qui-Gon Jinn
subtitle: Unconventional Master
text:
After you resolve 3 dice showing a special ([special]) in the same action, deal 1 damage to a character.
[special] - Deal 1 damage to a character. Give 1 shield to a character. Turn one of your dice to any side.

name: Confronting Fear
text: Reroll one of your Blue character dice. Then reroll a number of dice equal to the value showing on the die you just rerolled. Then turn one of those dice to any side.

name: Pacify
text: Remove a character die. Then give that character 2 shields.

name: Thought Control
text: Spot a Blue character and give 2 resources to an opponent to resolve one of their non-Yellow dice showing a value of 3 or less as if it were your own. Then you may turn one of your dice to a side showing a value of 0.

name: Inner Force
text: Remove any number of shields from one of your Blue characters. Then remove that many dice.

name: Luke Skywalker's Spirit
text:
Discard this support from play if you control Luke Skywalker.
[special] - Resolve another one of your Blue dice without removing it from your pool. Then shuffle this support into its owner's deck unless you remove 1 shield from one of your characters.

name: Ki-Adi-Mundi's Blue Lightsaber
text:
Redeploy.
Discard this upgrade from play if you control Ki-Adi-Mundi's Green Lightsaber. 
After you resolve a die showing a value of 1, you may resolve this die not showing a resource ([resource]), increasing its value by 1.

name: Ki-Adi-Mundi's Green Lightsaber
text:
Redeploy.
Discard this upgrade from play if you control Ki-Adi-Mundi's Blue Lightsaber.
[special] - Remove 1 shield from one of your characters to heal 1 damage from a character. Then deal 2 damage to a character.

name: Qui-Gon Jinn's Trick
text: After an opponent rolls a die, you may spot a Jedi and exhaust this upgrade to turn that die to the previous or next side on the box of its dice reference (considering as one all sides that are identical), or to any side instead if this upgrade is on Qui-Gon Jinn and he has one or more shields.

name: Finn
subtitle: Promoted General
text:
After you activate this character, turn an opponent's die to a side showing damage. Then turn one of your dice to a side showing damage.
After you resolve this die, you may activate one of your Red characters, or spend 1 resource to activate one of your non-Red characters instead.

flavor: “Mesa propose that the Senate gives immediately emergency powers to the Supreme Chancellor.”
name: Jar Jar Binks
subtitle: Gungan Representative
text: After you activate this character, discard a card from the top of a deck for each die showing a blank ([blank]). Then reroll all opponents' dice showing a blank ([blank]).

name: Leia Organa
subtitle: Alderaan Princess
text:
After setup, give 1 shield to each of your characters.
After this card was flipped, shuffle 2 set-aside copies each of Motivate ([WotF]79) and Help me Obi-Wan Kenobi ([EC]45) into your deck.

name: Rescuing a Princess
text:
Team Up 1: Chewbacca, Han Solo, Luke Skywalker, Obi-Wan Kenobi.
After you remove an opponent's character die, place 1 resource on this plot. Then, if there are 4 or more resources on this plot, place them on another card you control, exhaust this plot and flip it.

name: Help me Obi-Wan Kenobi
text: Spot a leader to draw a card. You may discard that card to remove a die showing a value of 2 or less.

name: Victory is Ahead
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing a blank ([blank]).
Resolve one of your dice as if it were showing a different symbol.

flavor: “You're braver than I thought.” – Leia Organa
name: You Came In That Thing?
text: Spot a leader to ready a piloted vehicle.

name: Tantive IV
text: After you activate this support, you may spot a leader to remove a die showing a value of 2 or less. [special] - Heal 1 damage from a character. Then, if you spot Leia Organa or Bail Organa, heal 1 damage from a character.

name: X-Wing
text: The X on this die is equal to 1. While this support is piloted, increase X by 1. While a mod is on this support, increase X by 1.

name: Ace Pilot
text: Pilot character only. Before attached character's character die is resolved, if it is against a Death Star plot, you may exhaust this upgrade to increase its value by 1. After you activate attached character, you may resolve one of its character or piloted vehicle's support dice.

name: Rebel Trooper Blaster
text: Redeploy. After you resolve this die showing damage, if this upgrade is attached to a trooper or leader, you may deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent.

name: Into the Garbage Chute
text: Exhaust one of your characters to remove up to 2 dice showing damage.

flavor: “There's no liars in this game, just players.”
name: Lando Calrissian
subtitle: Galactic Trickster
text:
Piloting.
After you remove one of your dice for the first time each round, you may resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 1.

name: Zeb Orrelios
subtitle: Reliable Teammate
text: The value of this die is increased by 1 if it modifies or is modified by another Spectre die. Power Action - Spot any number of Spectres to resolve that many of your dice showing a modifier as if they were not a modifier.

name: Double Dare
text: Spot a scoundrel to remove one of your dice. Then gain 2 resources.

name: Negotiate
text: Remove one of your character dice to force   an opponent to choose and remove 2 of     their dice.

name: Millennium Falcon
text: Before you resolve this die, remove one of your pilot dice or remove this die. After this support becomes piloted, you may roll this die into your pool. [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character. Then deal 1 damage to a character for each character piloting this support.

name: Bottoms up!
text:
After you resolve this die, you may look at the bottom card of your deck. Then, if this upgrade is on Sinjir Rath Velus, you may play that card. Otherwise, play that card, if able, or discard it.
[special] - Draw a card. Then place a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck.

name: Lando Calrissian's Blaster
text:
Before you play this upgrade, you may remove one of your dice to decrease its cost by 1.
After you play this upgrade, you may remove one of your dice to roll a character die on one of your characters into your pool.

flavor: “We're not exactly anything. We're a crew. A team. In some ways, a family.” – Sabine Wren
name: Welcome to the Team
text: Attached character gains the Spectre subtype. After you activate another Spectre, you may reroll one of attached character's character or upgrade dice.

illustrator: Lan Jun Kang © Sony Online Entertainment
name: Force Sensitive Trickster
text: After you activate this character, you may force a player to place all cards in their hand on the bottom of their deck in any order and draw that same number of cards, minus 1 if you spot a Yellow character, plus 1 if you spot a Red character.

name: Beguile
text: Reroll an opponent's die. Then turn one of their dice to any side. Then remove one of their dice.

name: Meditative Truce
text: Remove one of your Blue character dice and give that character 1 shield to remove a die showing damage.

name: Parry and Riposte
text: Spot a Blue character to turn a die to any side. Then, if you turned an opponent's die, you may reroll one of your dice.

name: Saber Quick Draw
text: Ambush. Play a Blue weapon from your hand on one of your Jedi or Sith. Then you may spend 1 resource to give that character 1 shield and activate it.

name: Sharing the Force
text: Remove one or more of your character dice. Then turn one of your dice to a side showing a value equal to the number of dice you just removed.

name: Curved-Hilt Lightsaber
text: Redeploy. While this upgrade is on a Jedi or a Sith, you can resolve this die showing a modifier as if it were not a modifier. After one of your Blue dice is turned, you may reroll this die.

name: Defensive Blast
text: Spot a Red character and deal 1 indirect damage to yourself to remove up to 2 dice with a combined value of 3 or more.

name: Emergency Powers
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing a blank ([blank]).
Remove a character die, or you may spend 2 resources to remove 2 character dice instead.

name: Prepare To Fight
text: Spot a leader to draw 2 cards. You may discard any number of those cards to gain that many resources.

name: Troop Reinforcement
text: Spot a Red character to reroll 2 of your dice. Then remove one of those dice to resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by the removed one's value.

name: Umbaran Starfighter
text: This support can only be piloted by pilots that are 14 or more points. [special] - Deal 2 indirect damage to an opponent. You may spend 1 resource to remove a droid or vehicle die.

name: DH-17 Turret
text: Modify vehicle support. After you play this upgrade, you may activate one of your pilots.

name: Tusken Raider
text: Before you resolve this die, you may discard a card from your hand to increase its value by 1 or to force an opponent to lose 1 resource.

name: Arrgh!
text: Spot any number of scavengers to move that many resources from a card you don't control to a non-plot card you control.

name: Entangle
text: Spot a Yellow character to remove up to 2 dice showing a combined value of 3 or less.

name: Placing A Bet
text: Reroll 2 character dice. Then discard a number of cards from the top of a deck equal to the highest value showing on those dice.

name: Shoot First
text: Reroll 3 dice. Then you may resolve one of your dice, increasing it's value by 1.

name: Too Fast For You
text:
Play only if it is your second action this turn.
Remove a die showing a value of 2 or less.

name: Trading Goods
text: Remove one of your scoundrel dice showing a value of 2 or more to choose two : • Gain 1 resource. • Deal 1 damage to a character. • Turn a die to any side.

name: A Game of Sabacc
text: After an opponent plays a card, you may discard a card from your hand with a lower cost to place 1 resource on this plot. Action - Search your deck or discard pile for a Yellow vehicle with a cost equal to or lower than the number of resources on this plot and play it for free. Set this plot aside.

name: Bantha
text: After you discard any number of cards from your hand from a card effect, place 1 resource on this support. Power Action - Exhaust this support or spot a scavenger to take 1 resource from it.

name: Sabacc Trickster
text:
Before you resolve this die, if this upgrade is on Lando Calrissian, discard one or more cards from your hand to draw that many cards plus 1.
[special] - If you have more cards in hand than an opponent, take 1 resource from that opponent.

name: Eternal Conflict
text: Roll a character die on one of your characters into your pool. Force an opponent to roll a character die on one of their characters into their pool. You may remove that opponent's die or resolve the die that you just rolled.

name: Leading the Front
text: After you activate a character, you may reroll a die to flip this plot.

name: Team Effort
text:
After you activate a character, you may choose and do one :
• Spot 2 Blue characters to turn a die to any side.
• Spot 2 Red characters to draw a card.
• Spot 2 Yellow characters to resolve one of your dice.
Then set this plot aside.

name: Profitable Connection
text: You start the game with 1 additional resource.

name: Sith Crypts
subtitle: Exegol
text: Claim - Deal 1 damage to a character or heal 1 damage from a villain character.

name: Resistance Base
subtitle: Ajan Kloss
text: Claim - Reroll a die or remove a villain die.

name: Sabacc Playroom
subtitle: Numidian Prime
text: Power Action - Choose an opponent. You and that opponent reveal 2 random cards from your hands. Then the player whose cards' combined cost is the lowest takes 1 resource from the other (nothing happens in case of a tie).

name: Tactical Warzone
subtitle: Scarif
text: After you activate a character, you may give control of the battlefield to an opponent to reroll a die.
